thread.title: Motorcyclist stops traffic to save a tiny little kitten
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Motorcyclist stops traffic to save a tiny little kitten - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Motorcyclist stops traffic to save a tiny little kitten
text:
It might sound cliched to say it nowadays, but this really does restore a little bit of our faith in humanity.
An unnamed female motorcyclist was sitting in traffic when she noticed a tiny little kitten sitting in the middle of a traffic intersection. How it'd get there, you might ask?
If you look at the video from 10 seconds on and watch out for a wine-coloured car as it passes, you'll see a tiny little orange thing on the ground afterwards. Yes, that's a kitten.
The motorcyclist quickly tried to flag people down before she drove out into the intersection and grabbed the kitten.
The motorcyclist has tried to get in touch with the kitten's owner, but in the meantime, she's kept the little thing for herself and named it Skidmarks. Or Skids, for short.
What's more, GoPro actually got in touch with the motorcyclist via her YouTube page and her sending out some free swag.
She gets an adorable kitten AND free stuff? Being a good person isn't always its own reward, y'know.
Via YouTube
